DashboardPage.title: Risk Dashboard
DashboardPage.description: Overview of your current risk landscape for UPR: {uprId}, Period: {period}.
DashboardPage.riskDistributionDescription: Number of potential risks in each calculated level for this UPR/Period.
DashboardPage.noRiskDataForChart: No potential risk data available for chart.
DashboardPage.highPriorityRisksDescription: Top 5 critical or high-level potential risks requiring attention for this UPR/Period.
DashboardPage.noHighPriorityRisks: No high priority potential risks identified.

GoalsPage.title: Goals
GoalsPage.description: Define and manage your strategic objectives for UPR: {uprId}, Period: {period}.
GoalsPage.noGoalsYet: No goals yet for this UPR/Period
GoalsPage.getStartedAddingGoal: Get started by adding your first goal.
GoalsPage.toastGoalAddedDescription: New goal "{name}" has been successfully added.

AddGoalDialog.addDescription: Define a new goal to start managing its risks. For UPR: {uprId}, Period: {period}
AddGoalDialog.editDescription: Update the details of your goal. For UPR: {uprId}, Period: {period}

AllRisksPage.title: All Potential Risks
AllRisksPage.description: Manage all identified potential risks across all goals for UPR: {uprId}, Period: {period}.
AllRisksPage.noPotentialRisksYet: No potential risks identified yet for this UPR/Period
AllRisksPage.getStartedAddingPotentialRisk: Click "Add New Potential Risk" to start populating your risk register, or identify risks from specific goals.
AllRisksPage.toastCannotAddRiskDescription: Please create at least one goal for the current UPR/Period before adding a potential risk.

GoalRisksPage.title: Potential Risks for Goal: {goalName}
GoalRisksPage.emptyStateDescription: Use the AI tool above to brainstorm potential risks for this goal.
GoalRisksPage.loadingData: Loading goal and potential risk data...
GoalRisksPage.goalNotFound: Goal not found for UPR: {uprId}, Period: {period}.
GoalRisksPage.toastPotentialRisksIdentifiedDescription: {count} potential risks brainstormed for "{goalName}". You can now edit their details and add causes.

ManagePotentialRiskPage.description: Manage the details and causes for a potential risk. UPR: {uprId}, Period: {period}.
ManagePotentialRiskPage.riskOwnerPlaceholder: e.g., Head of Operations, IT Department
ManagePotentialRiskPage.riskCausesDescription: Identify and manage specific causes contributing to this potential risk.
ManagePotentialRiskPage.noCausesIdentified: No causes identified yet for this potential risk.
ManagePotentialRiskPage.toastPRCreatedSuccess: Potential Risk "{description}" created. You can now add its causes.
ManagePotentialRiskPage.toastErrorSavingPR: Cannot save. Potential risk data is missing.
ManagePotentialRiskPage.toastErrorInvalidGoal: Selected parent goal not valid for current UPR/Period.
ManagePotentialRiskPage.toastErrorAddingCauseMissingRisk: Cannot add cause. Parent potential risk context is missing.
ManagePotentialRiskPage.toastErrorAddingCauseMissingGoal: Cannot add cause. Parent goal for potential risk not found.

RiskIdentificationCard.title: AI-Powered Potential Risk Identification
RiskIdentificationCard.description: Use AI to brainstorm potential risks for goal: {goalName}.
RiskIdentificationCard.refineDescription: Refine the description below for better AI results.
RiskIdentificationCard.goalContextPlaceholder: E.g., Successfully launch a new mobile application for iOS and Android platforms by Q3, targeting 10,000 active users within 6 months.
RiskIdentificationCard.goalContextHelper: Provide a clear, detailed description including the UPR ({uprId}) and Period ({period}) context for the AI.
RiskIdentificationCard.toastAIBrainstormingErrorDescription: Failed to brainstorm potential risks using AI.

SettingsPage.title: Application Settings
SettingsPage.uprPeriodCardDescription: Configure the active UPR and reporting period for the application.
SettingsPage.uprIdInfo: UPR ID is currently set system-wide and not changeable via this UI yet.
SettingsPage.changePeriodInfo: Changing the active period will reload the application.
SettingsPage.managePeriodsCardDescription: Add new reporting periods to the system.
SettingsPage.toastPeriodChangedDescription: Active period set to {period}. Page will reload.
SettingsPage.toastErrorAddingPeriodFormat: Use YYYY, YYYY/YYYY, or YYYY-S1/S2/Q1-Q4 format.

RiskAnalysisModal.title: Analyze Potential Risk
RiskAnalysisModal.description: Assess the likelihood and impact for the potential risk: {riskDescription}

RiskControlModal.description: Define a control measure for the potential risk: {riskDescription}.

ManageRiskCausesDialog.title: Manage Risk Causes for: {riskDescription}
ManageRiskCausesDialog.description: Identify and manage potential causes for this risk. UPR: {uprId}, Period: {period}.
ManageRiskCausesDialog.noCausesIdentified: No causes identified yet for this potential risk.
